website_summaries.verdict: These well made glasses and decanter are the perfect set for entertaining guests, and the set comes in at a low price.
pros: Set includes 6 glasses and a matching decanter
Glasses have a quality, heavy feel to them
The large 7-piece set is perfect for entertaining guests
The low cost makes these whiskey glasses a real steal
cons: The decanter lid fits well but is not an air tight seal

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!  Not heirloom quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to start an infinity bottle for whiskey. It serves that purpose, and looks great doing it! The inside of the stopper’s cheap, plastic, and definitely looks like it might break at some point in the near future. The cocktail glasses look great, if a little fragile. I definitely wouldn’t muddle anything in them. If you’re looking for a cheap decanter that’ll look great on your bar or in liquor cabinet, look no further. If you want to purchase a really nice gift, or an heirloom quality display piece, you’re probably going to need to pony up a little more cash.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate: buy it now!
customer_reviews.text: This product is classy, very suitable for a gift and very nice designed. I first bought it as a present for my husband and he simply loved it! Now we bought another set to give it to our best friend as a birthday gift. The box where it comes is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: ASPM

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Shipping time wasn't bad. Quality/ clarity of glass is meh. My biggest complaint is the stopper... Because of the thin cheap plastic It does NOT seat right/sits crooked and most deffinatley is NOT air tight, not even a little. If you are looking for an ok looking Decatur to fill and set out for a party (but you will empty what's left back into the original bottle after the party) then this will probably work for you. But I am unable to put a 60.00 bottle of long branch in this and let it sit on my bar for an extended period of time.
customer_reviews.author: William Mounce

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money! I tested the units seal and held it upside down for about 10 minutes filled with water. There was some dripping, but not a lot and overall it’s a great unit considering the price. Love it. It’s currently filled with woodford reserve and it looks great in my living room. The guests like it too.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gaiski

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the value
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband. He’s currently building himself a home bar and I thought this would be a nice beginning touch for his future collection. For the price, you can’t beat this set! Looks really beautiful in person and makes a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Ooooh you fancy huh?
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the set looks, especially sitting in the sun. Its beautiful! Plenty of glasses for friends or family. I feel like I'm having an experience every time i drink with this set. I feel like anybody drinking with me is a part of that special experience too. The only thing I would change is the top on the "decanter". Its plastic where it seals shut. A little wiggly but it does shut. I should of gone with a set that had a corkscrew material at the seal instead. But other than that I love it. And I can deal with the plastic. Its really not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Omar Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is....
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set, especially for the Christmas sale price that I got, but I'll note that the cap does not fit completely down on the decanter. In the reviews I did see someone else mention this, but I assumed maybe they got a defective one. Well, the same is true for the one I received. And since it doesn't fit correctly the cap sits at a slight angle.
customer_reviews.author: GO TRIBE 17

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This glass set was everything I needed. I thought it was going to be cheap looking but surprisingly I was wrong, they look very expensive and I love it. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: love***

customer_reviews.title: Gift Recipients Loved It
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and have now received a thank you from every member of the family. They love it. Highly recommend, attractive, heavy, very good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Enough Already

customer_reviews.title: Set
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with it. The stopper or lid will not set straight! It’s made of plastic and not very well! I liked the glassed
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a gift. He loved it! The set was heavy and beautiful. The only downside is the plastic cork on the decanter. It makes kind of a weird noise each time you open it. Otherwise, a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decanter and glasses
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my significant other and they love it! I had to buy nice whisky to put in it for the bragging factor but the glasses are beautiful and perfect and the decanter is great just the top is rubber corked and doesn’t sit straight all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Callie Norton

customer_reviews.title: came broken.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses themselves are nice and sturdy and look great. The Decanter is very thin glass and arrived in very small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: seth

customer_reviews.title: Nice but, broke easily
customer_reviews.text: These glasses lasted me about a month before one by one they would develop a hairline crack in them starting from the lip down. I'm not sure if it was the dishwasher or the fact that I would stack them in the cupboard. I'm currently down to 3 glasses left.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: My first order came with several broken glasses. However, Amazon quickly sent a replacement and it's fine. The product is very nice. It's easy to tell it's cut glass vs. crystal but I didn't expect anything else given the price.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking, but Stopper is Garbage
customer_reviews.text: The stopper is made of plastic at the contact point with the decanter. It features cheap plastic rings that quickly (within a couple months) began fraying and they eventually broke off completely. Due to this feature alone, this decanter set is garbage overall, though the glasses are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Dave G.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of glasses, they look nice. Only issue I had was the seal on the main container is not very good quality, it doesn’t seal right.
customer_reviews.author: Mario Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but top of decanter doesn't stay on well. Wish it fit more snug on the top. Instead is loose and is lopsided.
customer_reviews.author: DQ

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Really like this set. The reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is the bottle cap has a plastic fitting making it hard to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: MDG

customer_reviews.title: Decent set
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected and not the quality expected but decent
customer_reviews.author: C Butler

customer_reviews.title: Check the lid. Other than that, the decanter is beautiful.
customer_reviews.text: Broken lid. Maybe be broken before I got it and I didn't notice. It is so sad.
customer_reviews.author: RayAdex

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give as a gift, and it's just right! The receiver was soooo happy with it. It's a beautiful set, just the right size, and was very nice presented.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Scratched, but still good
customer_reviews.text: Good set for the money. 4 stars instead of 5 because there were scratches on the decanter.

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and the person that I send it to loved it . Would actually like to have one for myself Looked more expensive than it was Great price Would buy again

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful buy!

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: The glasses in this set look nice, but the decanter itself is a little disappointing. The rubber stopper sits in a way that always leaves the top lopsided, giving it kind of a funny look.

customer_reviews.title: It makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: It will be used for company. It is very pretty

customer_reviews.title: Stopper does not fit properly
customer_reviews.text: This attractive set is heavy so I feel it will last. It is unfortunate that the stopper to the decanter does not fit properly. The glasses themselves are very nice.

customer_reviews.text: just got it today and finished my first glass from decanter Nice at Nuggets/Thunder halftime. HMMMMMMMM I think I will have another now. Second half you know.

customer_reviews.title: Just as you would expect, great value!
customer_reviews.text: For my first decanter set purchase, this is about what I expected, and wanted! Great purchase on my part!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set.
customer_reviews.text: Set was well worth the money. Beautiful. I am very pleased. I would buy it again as well as recommend to friends and family.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a hard worker ;)

customer_reviews.title: Quick ship, great bargain and very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Product is very nice and the glasses are not paper thin so I don’t have to worry about them breaking easily. I caught this set on a lightning deal and it was a bargain. This set was much nicer that I expected! Yay!! 🥃 Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Lana M Howard

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is strong glass
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. The decanter looks really fancy and nice, almost like I spent a ton of money on it. The glasses are perfect for whiskey, and also look really nice. Even though they are glass, they are nice and thick so they arent going to be easy to break.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A

customer_reviews.title: Nice started set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who has always wanted a decanter set. Unfortunately on one of the glasses was in pieces when it arrived but Amazon fully refunded my account so we could buy another one. The decanter has a nice pattern but doesn't seal completely which is ok for some liquor but I wouldn't put our expensive whiskeys in them. For the price it's a great starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer1

customer_reviews.title: Pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Clearly, you pay for what you get. Well packaged and nothing is cracked or broken. My only take away is the glass stop made with plastic and upon removal the glass stop from the bottle it requires little force. I’m sure in time it will break in. Presentation of the set is nice.
customer_reviews.author: VEGAS

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift & Value!
customer_reviews.text: I took this to a white elephant party and it was the most popular gift! It got stolen the max number of times and everyone loved it. It looks expensive, but is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift, I can't give a review on the use of the product but it came to me exactly as described and it looks like a nice set.
customer_reviews.author: Valgal

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an anniversary gift and it was a hit. I love this set, it is a great quality, nice a heavy and the crystal cuts in it is beautiful. I am getting one for my bar as well.
customer_reviews.author: Silki

customer_reviews.title: for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's nice. the stopper however has a plastic seal that doesn't fit quite right. Nice looking set however and since I don't entertain often, it will do.
customer_reviews.author: coorscur

customer_reviews.title: Glasses great, Decanter a bust.
customer_reviews.text: The glasses are great! The decanter not so much. If the stopper on the decanter wasnt super cheap flimsy plastic (does not stop liquid from spilling out) it would be great!

customer_reviews.title: Style, class, durability
